entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pinawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
